1251.content: How will lead of the Bull's Chargers gain weight?
1251.title: Iron Bull

choices: Krem pokes of Iron Bull's weight
Iron Bull starts training and notices he's sluggish
Iron Bull sees Cullen and notices he's been putting on weight too
Iron Bull gets ambushed and captured
12511.content:
"Man if only the priests could see me now" Iron Bull thought to himself. he had just finished devouring a feast all by himself, man working with the Inquisition does have its perks. It had been a couple of months since the death of Corypheus and Solas disappearing. But even though the Bull Chargers have finished their job with the Inquisition, they decided to continue their partnership with the Inquisition to make sure that there was no other problems with rifts, the Venatori, etc. But for now there hadn't been a lot of things to explore or dragons to kill, so now Iron Bull was now stuck in Skyhold with nothing to die. But it wasn't long till he found something to pass the time, food. Gifts were coming in by the wagon load as people wanted tot hank the Inquisition for saving the world. And Iron Bull was happy to help indulge himself as the Inquisitor allowed his compatriots to share in their gifts. So many delicacies from Feralden, Orlais, and even the Free Marches gave presents, many of it food to honor the Inquisition for its service.

But of course there was the drawback in having so much food around Skyhold, Iron Bull had some pudge growing around his midsection and he was aware of it but tried not to focus on it too much. After all he had left the life of the strict teachings of the Qun and now instead lived his own life, so what if that meant he started to put on a little weight. he could lose it, he bet sooner or later the Inquisitor would make a meeting saying that needed to kill another dragon and poof! The weight would be gone. But for now he was going to enjoy himself, after all he never got to enjoy himself like this for long.
12511.title: Falling into Decadence

1552.content: Which guy would you like to see gain weight?
1552.title: Coming Out on Top

info.brief_description: Your favorite video game characters pack on the pounds whether they want to or not
info.description:
Have characters from your favorite video game gain weight any genre that you like!

Rules

Men can only gain weight,
All characters must be 18 or older, and chapters including characters younger than that will be deleted ASAP
No instant weight gains
Try for a more slower growth and time skips are allowed every once and awhile
No slob
Same sex couples allowed and encouraged
